item.title: Install ML workloads with Rancher: from cluster to inference
item.description: This guide walks through a practical path to run ML workloads using Rancher as the control plane. It covers provisioning clusters, creating nodepools for GPU and spot/low-priority instances, installing an ML inference stack (KServe), and deploying a minimal demo model.
